verses.name: Song of Songs 2:1
verses.text: I am the rose of Sharon, and the lily of the valleys.

verses.name: Song of Songs 2:2
verses.text: As the lily among thorns, so is my love among the daughters.

verses.name: Song of Songs 2:3
verses.text: As the apple tree among the trees of the wood, so is my beloved among the sons. I sat down under his shadow with great delight, and his fruit was sweet to my taste.

verses.name: Song of Songs 2:4
verses.text: He brought me to the banqueting house, and his banner over me was love.

verses.name: Song of Songs 2:5
verses.text: Stay me with flagons, comfort me with apples: for I am sick of love.

verses.name: Song of Songs 2:6
verses.text: His left hand is under my head, and his right hand doth embrace me.
